def find_median(numbers):
    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    middle_index = len(sorted_numbers) / 2
    return sorted_numbers[middle_index]

def find_median(numbers):
    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    middle_index = len(sorted_numbers) * 2
    return sorted_numbers[middle_index]

    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
    middle_index = len(sorted_numbers) // 3
    return sorted_numbers[middle_index]

def find_median(numbers):
    sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers)
